definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 6:1 skirt, of robe;—pl. cstr. [[שׁוּלֵי]] Ex 28:34 +; sf. [[שׁוּלַיִח]] Na 3:5 +, [[שׁוּלָיו]] Is 6:1 +, [[שׁוּלֶיהָ]] La 1:9;—skirts; of ´[[י]]:’s train, in vision Is 6:1; elsewh. of city personif. as woman, in phrase of ignominy, [[חָשַׂפְתִּי שׁוּלַיִח]] Je 13:26, [[עַל־פָּנַיִח]] ´[[גִּלֵּתִי שׁ]]: Na 3:5, ´[[ונו]] :´[[נִגְּלוּ שׁ]]: Je 13:22; of defilement, [[טֻמְאָתָהּ]] ´[[בְּשׁ]]: La 1:9; of high priest’s robe Ex 28:33, Ex 28:33, Ex 28:34 = Ex 39:24, Ex 39:25, Ex 39:26 (all P).
